sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The fire upon the altar. Or Divine meditations and essayes containing the substance of Christian religion Rowe, Cheyne.
[8], 303, 308-400 [i.e. 396] : ill. (metal cut)
printed by T.S. and are to be sold by Abel Roper at the Sun against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleet-street, London : 1679.
With engraving preceeding title page. Errata on pg. [8]. Preface signed by C. Rowe. Text and register continuous despite pagination. Text is extremely mispaginated. Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
=======

printed by T.S. and are to be sold by Abel Roper at the Sun against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleet-street, London : 1679.
With engraving preceeding title page. Errata on pg. [8]. Preface signed by C. Rowe. Text and register continuous despite pagination. Text is extremely mispaginated. Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
Abel Roper

the Sun against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleet-street
